text: Texcoconibacillus is a genus of bacteria from the family of Bacillaceae with one known species (Texcoconibacillus texcoconensis). Texcoconibacillus texcoconensis has been isolated from the lake Texcoco in Mexico. ==References== == Further reading == * Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria genera Category:Monotypic bacteria genera
title: Texcoconibacillus
